resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

wjones127 commented on PR #13615:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13615#issuecomment-1185594411

   > @wjones127 the syntax and how it gets displayed by github is a bit confusing, I used *hdfs* (as a glob search pattern), although this "looks" the same as what you typed
   
   Thanks! I couldn't remember how it works, and GitHub's "quote reply" feature was misleading me to think it was underscores.

wjones127 commented on PR #13615:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13615#issuecomment-1185607931

   The tests failures are unrelated. The scanner failure test looks to be: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17087
